plugin._field_explanation: Misc settings for the motion sensor

item.Name: show scripted pings at any distance

_field_real.name: active camo appears as enemy when lower than#active Camo users show up as enemy when active camo is lower than this value (multiplayer)
height classified as above#relative height at which something is above (meters)
height classified as below#relative height at which something is below (meters)
threshold speed#speed at which stuff is visible on the sensor (meters/sec)
upwards movement scaling#multiplier for vertical speed upwards (multiplier)
downwards movement scaling#multiplier for vertical speed downwards (multiplier)
crouching movement scaling#multiplier for speed when crouching (multiplier)
normal detection range extension#how far off the edge of the radar we can detect things (multiplier)
vehicle detection range extension#how far off the edge of the radar we can detect vehicles (multiplier)
vehicle radar range#special range boost used for large flying vehicles (meters)
mech radar range#override for mech/mantis
vehicle navigation marker range detection#range at which hud nav markers will show (meters)
vehicle contested flash time#rate at which a contested vehicle flashes (seconds)
activecamo xray animation cooldown #duration to wait before showing another animation (seconds)
dead people visible time#time for which we will see dead team mates (seconds)

_field_long_integer.name: Motion Tracker Fade Frames#The number of frames that a non moving target will fade out over on the motion tracker.
Armor Mod Display Counter#The number of seconds to show the players armor mod in the HUD (seconds).

_field_real.name: Broadsword Parallax Velocity Override
Pelican Parallax Velocity Override

plugin._field_explanation: Misc settings for fanfares and messages

_field_real.name: fanfare display time #time to display the fanfares (seconds)
fanfare speed up display time #time to display when higher priority fanfare queues up (seconds)
medal score message lifetime #message time of the medal score message (seconds)
medal score message restart time #time to reset message to when messages collide (seconds)

plugin._field_explanation: Misc settings for the remote motion sensor

_field_real.name: remote sensor range#absolute range. (meters)
remote sensor weak distance#distance at which the remote sensor starts to fail (meters)
remote sensor failure distance#distance at which the remote sensor completely fails (meters)
shield bar recent damage duration#time taken to drain an entire bar of visible damage. less damage drains faster (seconds)
damage indicator response duration#duration which the damage indicator icons will show in the HUD (seconds)
damage flash response duration#used to determine how long to show the fullscreen damage flash (seconds)

_field_tag_reference.name: tiled mesh seen when hit in 1st person

_field_real.name: number of tiles across the screen
mesh alpha multiplier
mesh alpha gradient
mesh alpha at centre (0..1)
mesh alpha at screen edge (0..1)
Reticule maximum spread angle:degrees#Maximum spread for all weapon reticules. This should be set to the largest spread angle of all the weapons.

plugin._field_explanation: Settings controlling the high contrast hud rendering

_field_real.name: Minimum Threshold#Minimum brightness value at which the dynamic contrast activates.
Maximum Threshold#Brightness value at which the dynamic contrast is fully activated.
Clamp Threshold#Clamped brightness value. Can be used to limit the intensity of the dynamic contrast, or enable over strength contrast.
Darken Factor#Opacity of the black layer.
Brighten Factor#Overbrightness factor to apply to the additive layer.
medal fanfare animation lifetime #animation time of the medal fanfare (seconds)
medal fanfare animation in lifetime #animation in time of the medal fanfare (seconds)
medal fanfare animation out begin time #the time to begin the animation out sequence (seconds)
event fanfare animation lifetime #animation time of the medal fanfare (seconds)
event fanfare animation in lifetime #animation in time of the medal fanfare (seconds)
event fanfare animation out begin time #the time to begin the animation out sequence (seconds)

_field_string_id.name: display string#comes out of the HUD text globals

_field_word_integer.name: max display time#how long the message can be on screen before being hidden
display count#how many times a training message will get displayed (0-3 only!)
dissapear delay#how long a displayed but untriggered message stays up
redisplay delay#how long after display this message will stay hidden

_field_real.name: display delay (s)#how long the event can be triggered before it's displayed
